SELECT COUNT(a.NTT_ID) FROM COMTN_BBS a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.BBS_ID = #{bbsId}
AND a.NTT_SJ LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND a.NTT_CN LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND b.USER_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'

SELECT a.BBS_ID , a.NTT_ID , a.NTT_SJ , a.NTCR_ID , a.NTCR_NM , a.NTT_NO , a.NTT_CN , a.PASSWORD , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID , b.USER_NM AS "frstRegisterNm" , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" , a.NTCE_BGNDE , a.NTCE_ENDDE , a.RDCNT , a.USE_AT , a.ATCH_FILE_ID , a.PARNTS_NTT_ID , a.ANSWER_AT , a.THREAD_DEPTH , a.THREAD_GROUP_NO FROM COMTN_BBS a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.BBS_ID = #{bbsId} AND a.NTT_ID = #{nttId}
SELECT COUNT(NTT_ID) FROM COMTN_BBS WHERE BBS_ID = #{bbsId} AND USE_AT = 'Y'
